Articles.Content:
ESA(european space agency) recently release an interactive 360 degrees panorama of the ISS, after astronaut Samantha Cristoforetti took 15 pictures of each modules of the station.

You can see all the modules like if you were there, and have some cool videos explaining the purpose of some parts of the ISS, with other parts being just text.

As I'm writing this, the tour only lack the Russian modules, but don't worry, they will come ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

[click on this sentence to do the tour !\[:)\](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)](http://www.esa.int/Our_Activities/Human_Spaceflight/International_Space_Station/Highlights/International_Space_Station_panoramic_tour)
Thanks for informing me of this. **Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Rep'd.**
Yeah, man. This is super cool, thanks!
